long_description: Lightweight, maneuverable and stable, the Old Town Vapor 10 kayak offers recreational boaters an express ticket into the tranquil blue. Relatively short hull eases transport to the water, turns readily and takes up less space in your garage than longer boats. Comfort Flex seat flexes with every stroke and adjusts to personalize your position in the cockpit; quick-drying cushioning ensures day-long comfort. Single-layer polyethylene stands up to tough aquatic environments, offers high value and cleans up in a flash. Cargo well in stern stores lunch, water, a rain shell, bilge pump-anything you might want to bring along for the day. Padded thigh braces increase comfort in the cockpit; adjustable footbraces ensure an efficient paddling position. Features a molded paddle rest, cockpit tray and beverage holder.
short_description: Lightweight, maneuverable and stable, the Old Town Vapor 10 kayak offers recreational boaters an express ticket into the tranquil blue.
